attchmntText: Bajaj Housing Finance Limited has informed the Exchange about Investor/Analyst Group Meet Presentation
Hind Rectifiers Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Outcome of Board Meeting held on November 06, 2025.
Tenneco Clean Air India Limited has informed the Exchange regarding a press release dated December 05, 2025, titled "Tenneco Clean Air India Limited Announces Q2 and H1 FY2026 Results".
Gateway Distriparks Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'Disclosure under Regulation 29(2) of SEBI (Substantial acquisition of shares and takeovers) Regulations, 2011'.
Precision Camshafts Limited has informed the Exchange about Transcript
Tenneco Clean Air India Limited has submitted to the Exchange, the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025.
Lupin Limited has informed the Exchange regarding a press release dated December 05, 2025, titled "Lupin Receives Tentative Approval from U.S. FDA for Siponimod Tablets".
Apollo Micro Systems Limited has informed the Exchange about Investor Presentation
Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'Media Release'.
Bajaj Finserv Limited has informed the Exchange about Investor Presentation
Update on Direct-to-Consumer (D2C) Business
Kaynes Technology India Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'Clarification on summary of report published by Kotak Institutional Equities dated 03rd December 2025'.
Shriram Pistons & Rings Limited has informed the Exchange about Acquisition

Coforge Limited has informed the Exchange regarding a press release dated December 05, 2025, titled "Coforge named a Leader in Everest Group s Enterprise Quality Engineering (QE) Services PEAK Matrix Assessment 2025".

Ratnaveer Precision Engineering Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Outcome of Committee Meeting held on December 04, 2025 regarding approval of allotment of 12793102 equity shares of facevalue of Rs. 10/- each at a price of Rs. 145/- per equity shares.
IFGL Refractories Limited has informed the Exchange about General Updates

Lemon Tree Hotels Limited has informed the Exchange about the cancellation of Analyst / Institutional Investor Meeting scheduled on December 05, 2025 under the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
Alembic Pharmaceuticals Limited has informed the Exchange about Schedule of meet of one on one meeting with ICICI Prudential
Intimation of Postal Ballot Notice for the appointment of Mr. Niranjan Gupta as Whole-time Director and Mr. Bobby Parikh as Independent Director of the Company
